mapper.sql: id, order_number AS orderNumber, order_date AS orderDate, order_by AS orderBy, status, stock_valid_date AS stockValidDate, deliver_date AS deliverDate, deliver_method AS deliverMethod, deliver_number AS deliverNumber, deliver_amount AS deliverAmount, deliver_coins AS deliverCoins, address_id AS addressId, modified_date AS modifiedDate, modified_by AS modifiedBy, comment
mapper.select:
select a.id id, a.order_number orderNumber, a.order_date orderDate, a.order_by orderBy,a.status status,a.deliver_date deliverDate, a.deliver_method deliverMethod, a.deliver_number deliverNumber, b.receiver_phone addrPhone,b.receiver_name addrName, b.province province, b.city city, b.county county, b.street street, c.memberID memberIDs, d.doll_code dollCodes, d.quantity quantity, e.dollName dollName, e.img_url imgUrl from t_doll_order a LEFT JOIN t_member_addr b ON a.address_id=b.id LEFT JOIN t_member c on a.order_by = c.id LEFT JOIN t_doll_order_item d on d.order_id = a.id LEFT JOIN doll_info e on d.doll_code = e.dollCode where a.status='寄存中'
and b.receiver_phone like concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
and c.memberID = #{memberId}
order by a.modified_date DESC

select a.id id,a.order_date orderDate, a.order_by orderBy,a.status status,a.modified_date modifiedDate, b.receiver_phone addrPhone,b.receiver_name addrName, b.province province, b.city city, b.county county, b.street street,d.doll_name dollName,d.doll_url dollUrl,d.quantity quantity from t_doll_order a LEFT JOIN t_doll_order_item d on a.id = d.order_id LEFT JOIN t_member_addr b ON a.address_id=b.id where a.status='申请发货'
and b.receiver_phone like concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
and b.receiver_name like concat ('%',#{addrName},'%')
order by a.modified_date DESC

select a.id id,a.order_date orderDate, a.order_by orderBy,a.status status,a.deliver_date deliverDate,a.deliver_amount deliverAmount, a.deliver_method deliverMethod, a.deliver_number deliverNumber,a.modified_date modifiedDate, b.receiver_phone addrPhone,b.receiver_name addrName, b.province province, b.city city, b.county county, b.street street,d.doll_name dollName,d.doll_url dollUrl,d.quantity quantity from t_doll_order a LEFT JOIN t_member_addr b ON a.address_id=b.id LEFT JOIN t_doll_order_item d on a.id = d.order_id where a.status='已发货'
and b.receiver_phone like concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
and b.receiver_name like concat ('%',#{addrName},'%')
order by a.modified_date DESC

select b.receiver_phone addrPhone,b.receiver_name addrName, b.province province, b.city city, b.county county, b.street street,d.doll_name dollName from t_doll_order a LEFT JOIN t_doll_order_item d on a.id = d.order_id LEFT JOIN t_member_addr b ON a.address_id=b.id where a.status='申请发货'
and b.receiver_phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and b.receiver_name like concat('%',#{addrName},'%')
order by b.receiver_name DESC,b.county DESC
